Package danogl.gui.mouse

Class MouseActionParams

java.lang.Object
danogl.gui.mouse.MouseActionParams
public class MouseActionParams extends Object
Encapsulated information regarding a mouse action.
Author:
Dan Nirel

      public double getScrollClicks()
      The number of clicks scrolled since the last frame. Negative values for scrolling down, positive for up.
